languages.text: "Культисты смерти хотят, чтобы мы умертвили несчастного? Безумцы! Пока человек хочет жить, его можно спасти!" {n}Джай тянется к аугменту на шее.{/n} "Стоит хотя бы попытаться, прежде чем обрывать чью-то жизнь".

"The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."
languages.original_text: "Культисты смерти хотят, чтобы мы умертвили несчастного? Безумцы! Пока человек хочет жить, его можно спасти!" {n}Джай тянется к аугменту на шее.{/n} "Стоит хотя бы попытаться, прежде чем обрывать чью-то жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved while they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers reach for her neck augment.{/n} "Or at least you should try before discarding their life."

"The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved while they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers reach for her neck augment.{/n} "Or at least you should try before discarding their life."

"The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

"The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

"The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

"The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

languages.text: « Les cultistes de la mort attendent de nous que nous mettions fin à la vie de ce pauvre malheureux ? Ils ont perdu l'esprit, ma parole ! Quiconque manifeste encore l'envie de vivre mérite d'être sauvé ! » {n}Comme par réflexe, les doigts de Jae se rapprochent de son augmentique de cou.{/n} « Ou tout du moins méritent-ils qu'on tente de les sauver avant de les jeter aux oubliettes. »
languages.original_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

traits.locale_text: « Les cultistes de la mort attendent de nous que nous mettions fin à la vie de ce pauvre malheureux ? Ils ont perdu l'esprit, ma parole ! Quiconque manifeste encore l'envie de vivre mérite d'être sauvé ! » {n}Comme par réflexe, les doigts de Jae se rapprochent de son augmentique de cou.{/n} « Ou tout du moins méritent-ils qu'on tente de les sauver avant de les jeter aux oubliettes. »

languages.text: «¿Los cultistas de la Muerte quieren que acabemos con este pobre hombre? ¡Malditos lunáticos enfermos! ¡Cualquiera puede salvarse siempre que quiera vivir!». {n}Jae se lleva la mano al aumento del cuello por instinto.{/n} «Por lo menos, merece que se intente salvar su vida antes de descartarla».
languages.original_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los cultistas de la Muerte quieren que acabemos con este pobre hombre? ¡Malditos lunáticos enfermos! ¡Cualquiera puede salvarse siempre que quiera vivir!». {n}Jae se lleva la mano al aumento del cuello por instinto.{/n} «Por lo menos, merece que se intente salvar su vida antes de descartarla».

languages.text: 「死のカルトが可哀想な彼を始末しろだって？あの異常者ども！生きたいと願う内は、誰でも救われるべきだろう！」 {n}ジェイは反射的に、指を首のオーグメントの方へ運ぶ。{/n}「少なくとも命を切り捨ててしまう前に、救おうとやってみてあげるべきだよ」
languages.original_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

traits.locale_text: 「死のカルトが可哀想な彼を始末しろだって？あの異常者ども！生きたいと願う内は、誰でも救われるべきだろう！」 {n}ジェイは反射的に、指を首のオーグメントの方へ運ぶ。{/n}「少なくとも命を切り捨ててしまう前に、救おうとやってみてあげるべきだよ」

languages.text: “那群拜死教教徒打算让我们干掉这个可怜的家伙？他们简直是一群变态的疯子！无论是谁，只要还想活着，就应该想办法救一救才对！”{n}婕伊的手不由自主地摸着她自己的脖子。{/n}“至少在放弃他们的性命之前，应该先看看能不能把他们救回来。”
languages.original_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

traits.locale_text: “那群拜死教教徒打算让我们干掉这个可怜的家伙？他们简直是一群变态的疯子！无论是谁，只要还想活着，就应该想办法救一救才对！”{n}婕伊的手不由自主地摸着她自己的脖子。{/n}“至少在放弃他们的性命之前，应该先看看能不能把他们救回来。”

languages.text: "Die Todeskultisten wollen, dass wir dem armen Mann ein Ende bereiten? Diese kranken Irren! Jeder kann gerettet werden, solange er leben will!" {n}Jaes Finger bewegen sich instinktiv zu ihrer Halsaugmentierung.{/n} "Zumindest muss man versuchen, sie zu retten, bevor man ihr Leben wegwirft."
languages.original_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."

traits.locale_text: "Die Todeskultisten wollen, dass wir dem armen Mann ein Ende bereiten? Diese kranken Irren! Jeder kann gerettet werden, solange er leben will!" {n}Jaes Finger bewegen sich instinktiv zu ihrer Halsaugmentierung.{/n} "Zumindest muss man versuchen, sie zu retten, bevor man ihr Leben wegwirft."

languages.text: "Ölüm tarikatı, bu zavallı adamı öldürmemizi mi istiyormuş? Sapkın meczuplar! Yaşamak isteyen herkes kurtarılabilir!" {n}Jae'ın parmakları, içgüdüyle boynundaki ogmente gidiyor.{/n} "En azından canından edilmeden önce kurtarmak için çabalamamız lazım."
languages.original_text: "The death cultists want us to end the poor man? Those sick lunatics! Anyone can be saved as long as they still want to live!" {n}Jae's fingers move toward her neck augment instinctively.{/n} "At the very least, they deserve an attempt to save them before you discard their life."
